product_name: Kokatat Gore-Tex Full-Zip Paddling Jacket - Men's
long_description: Comfortable in the cockpit, the lightweight men's Kokatat Gore-Tex(R) full-zip paddling jacket is designed with the active paddler in mind. Supple, quiet and very packable, the jacket features an articulated design for freedom of movement. It'll be dry on the inside thanks to Gore-tex Paclite(R) fabric, an especially light, packable and breathable version of Gore-tex fabric. Adjustable spandex cuffs smoothly seal out splashes and drips, and an adjustable drawcord waist prevents jacket from riding up in the cockpit. You can access the zippered left-sleeve pocket and store a key on the internal lanyard even if you're wearing a PFD. Also includes a zippered chest pocket and 2 zippered handwarmer pockets with a cozy liner; both pockets are self draining. Factory sealed seams. The Kokatat Paclite paddling jacket for men has reflective piping for visibility.
short_description: Comfortable in the cockpit, the lightweight men's Kokatat Gore-Tex(R) full-zip paddling jacket is designed with the active paddler in mind.
